game.name: 8AM: The Shopping Mall
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "8AM: The Shopping Mall" is a suspense game set in an empty mall after closing. Watch through security cameras as strange movements unfold and decide if it’s a glitch, exhaustion, or something sinister until 8:00 a.m.
